text: Blue Bell may refer to: ==Places== * Blue Bell, Pennsylvania, United States * Blue Bell, South Dakota, United States ===Public houses=== * The Blue Bell, one of the "blue" public houses and inns in Grantham * Blue Bell, Chester, Cheshire, England, originally an inn, now a restaurant * The Blue Bell, Barton-upon-Humber, a former public house in Barton-upon-Humber ==Brands== * Blue Bell Creameries, an ice cream brand * Blue Bell, former manufacturer of the Wrangler jeans clothing brand ==See also== * Blue Bell Hill * Blue Bells * Bluebell (disambiguation) * Blue Ball (disambiguation)
title: Blue Bell
